scripts.pag: cd client && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.ser-pag: concurrently -n Servidor,React  "npm run dev"  "npm run pag"
scripts.app: concurrently -n Servidor,React,Electron  "npm run dev"  "npm run pag" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
